Package nom.tam.image.compression.tile.mask

package nom.tam.image.compression.tile.mask

(for internal use) Support for blank (null) values in compressed image tiles. It's weird that it has its own package and that its classes aren't bundled together with the closely related tiling and/or compression classes, but hey, that's life.

The classes of these package are used internally, e.g. by CompressedImageHDU and CompressedTableHDU, which are typically the main compression classes the user will interact with.

See Also:
  • CompressedImageHDU
  • CompressedTableHDU

    (for internal use) Tile compression support for images and tables.

    Description
    AbstractNullPixelMask
    (for internal use) Base support for blank (null) in compressed images.
    ImageNullPixelMask
    Support for blank (null) values in compressed images.
    NullPixelMaskPreserver
    (for internal use) Preserves blank (null) values in compressed images.
    NullPixelMaskRestorer
    (for internal use) Restores blank (null) values in deccompressed images.
